txt.en: Defeat the Watcher in the Water
The Flooded Treasury is a terrible place, filled with deadly malice from the cruel Watcher.
With the Watcher defeated, Moria will be safer for all who tread there.
Defeat the Watcher in the Water.
Drive back the Watcher at the Black Pool
Drive back the Watcher in the Flooded Treasury
The Watcher haunted the Black Pool, preventing the good dwarves from safely entering Khazad-d√ªm.
